excerpt: "Elon Musk’s AI startup, xAI, will release a preview of its technology on Friday, the Tesla CEO has announced. In a post on his X platform early Friday morning, Musk revealed that the company would be unveiling its technology to “select” individuals over the weekend—touting the tech as “the best that currently exists” in some areas."
